Package common

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
common.Utils
public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
Provides utility functions

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Utils.IVCipher
    A class binding a Cipher to its iv
    static interface  Utils.NSAEFunction<T>
    An interface representing a function which throws a NoSuchAlgorithmException or NoSuchPaddingException
    static interface  Utils.TransformFunction<T>
    An interface representing a function which transforms its input

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Utils.TransformFunction<java.lang.Integer> CASE_INSENSITIVE_FUNCTION
    A Utils.TransformFunction which applies the Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE flag to its input

    A Utils.NSAEFunction which creates a MessageDigest which hashes data using the algorithm specified in Constants.HASH_MODE

    A Utils.TransformFunction which applies the Pattern.LITERAL flag to its input

    A Utils.NSAEFunction which creates a Signature which signs data using the algorithm specified in Constants.SIGN_MODE

    • hash

      public static java.lang.String hash​(java.lang.String str)
      Hashes the given string using the algorithm specified in Constants.HASH_MODE and encodes it in base64
      Parameters:
      str - the string which will be hashed
      Returns:
      the base64 encoded, hashed string
      See Also:
      hash(byte[])

    • createAsymetricCipher

      public static javax.crypto.Cipher createAsymetricCipher​(int op, java.security.Key key) throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
      Creates a Cipher using the encryption mode specified in Constants.ASYMETRIC_ENCRYPTION_MODE
      Parameters:
      op - the opmode to initialize the Cipher with
      key - the key to initialize the Cipher with
      Returns:
      A Cipher that uses the encryption mode specified in Constants.ASYMETRIC_ENCRYPTION_MODE initialized with the given opmode and key.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given key is invalid, or its keysize exceeds the maximum allowable keysize
      See Also:
      Cipher.init(int, java.security.Key)

    • createCipher

      public static Utils.IVCipher createCipher​(int op, java.security.Key key) throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
      Creates a Cipher using the encryption mode specified in Constants.SECRET_ENCRYPTION_MODE
      Parameters:
      op - the opmode to initialize the Cipher with
      key - the key to initialize the Cipher with
      Returns:
      An Utils.IVCipher that uses the encryption mode specified in Constants.SECRET_ENCRYPTION_MODE initialized with the given opmode and key.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given key is invalid, or its keysize exceeds the maximum allowable keysize
      See Also:
      Cipher.init(int, java.security.Key)

    • createCipher

      public static Utils.IVCipher createCipher​(int op, java.security.Key key, byte[] iv) throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
      Creates a Cipher using the encryption mode specified in Constants.SECRET_ENCRYPTION_MODE
      Parameters:
      op - the opmode to initialize the Cipher with
      key - the key to initialize the Cipher with
      iv - the iv to initialize the cipher with
      Returns:
      An Utils.IVCipher that uses the encryption mode specified in Constants.SECRET_ENCRYPTION_MODE initialized with the given opmode and key.
      Throws:
      java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the given key is invalid, or its keysize exceeds the maximum allowable keysize
      See Also:
      Cipher.init(int, java.security.Key, java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec), IvParameterSpec

    • createPasswordKey

      public static javax.crypto.SecretKey createPasswordKey​(byte[] password)
      Creates a SecretKey from the given password using the PBE parameters defined in Constants
      Parameters:
      password - the password to generate the key from
      Returns:
      a PBE key based on the given password
      See Also:
      Constants.SECRET_KEY_FACTORY_ALGORITHM, Constants.PBE_KEY_SALT, Constants.PBE_KEY_ITERATION_COUNT, Constants.SECRET_KEY_LENGTH, PBEKeySpec

    • createPseudoRandomSecretKey

      public static javax.crypto.SecretKey createPseudoRandomSecretKey()
      Creates a pseudo random SecretKey of the algorithm type specified in Constants.SECRET_KEY_ALGORITHM
      Returns:
      a pseudo random SecretKey of the algorithm type specified in Constants.SECRET_KEY_ALGORITHM

    • bytesToChars

      public static char[] bytesToChars​(byte[] bytes)
      Converts the given byte array into a char array
      Parameters:
      bytes - the byte array to convert
      Returns:
      a char array with the data contained in the given byte array
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if bytes is null

    • catchNoSuchAlgorithmException

      public static <T> T catchNoSuchAlgorithmException​(Utils.NSAEFunction<T> function)
      Preforms the given function and reports any NoSuchAlgorithmExceptions or NoSuchPaddingExceptions that occur to the user.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type of the function
      Parameters:
      function - the function to preform
      Returns:
      the output of the inputted function

    • intToBytes

      public static byte[] intToBytes​(int x)
      Converts an integer to a byte array of length 4
      Parameters:
      x - the integer to convert
      Returns:
      a byte array of length four representing the given integer

    • bytesToInt

      public static int bytesToInt​(byte[] bytes) throws java.nio.BufferOverflowException, java.nio.BufferUnderflowException
      Converts a byte array of length 4 to an integer
      Parameters:
      bytes - the byte array to convert
      Returns:
      the integer representing the byte array
      Throws:
      java.nio.BufferOverflowException - if the given byte array contains more than four bytes
      java.nio.BufferUnderflowException - if the given byte array contains less than four bytes

    • randomString

      public static java.lang.String randomString​(int length)
      Creates a psudorandom, alphanumeric String
      Parameters:
      length - the length of the String to generate
      Returns:
      the generated String

    • countStringMatches

      public static int countStringMatches​(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String findStr, boolean quote, boolean matchCase)
      Counts the number of matches in the specified String
      Parameters:
      str - the string to search in
      findStr - a string specifying what to match
      quote - Should the findStr be matched as a literal string
      matchCase - Should the findStr only match specific case
      Returns:
      the number of matches in the specified String

    • conditionalTransform

      public static <T> T conditionalTransform​(T o, boolean condition, Utils.TransformFunction<T> function)
      Conditionally transforms the input based on a Utils.TransformFunction
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of variable which will be operated on
      Parameters:
      o - the value to conditionally transform
      condition - Should the value be transformed?
      function - a Utils.TransformFunction specifying the transformation
      Returns:
      the conditionally transformed input

    • fromNanos

      public static long fromNanos​(long nanos, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Converts from nanoseconds to the specified TimeUnit
      Parameters:
      nanos - the length of time in nanoseconds
      unit - the TimeUnit to convert to
      Returns:
      the equivalent duration in the specified TimeUnit

    • toNanos

      public static long toNanos​(long duration, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Converts from the specified TimeUnit to nanoseconds
      Parameters:
      duration - the length of time
      unit - the TimeUnit to convert from
      Returns:
      the equivalent duration in nanoseconds

    • contains

      public static <T> boolean contains​(T[] arr, T obj)
      Checks if the given object is contained in the array
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the array
      Parameters:
      arr - the array to search
      obj - the object to search for
      Returns:
